actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Max Barber in "The Christian Broadcasting Network, Inc. v. Carol Ann Kadushin, d/b/a Capital Broadcast News," Civil Action No. 84-1821.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Max Barber (a Senate employee) in the case of The Christian Broadcast Network, Inc. v. Carol Ann Kadushin, d/b/a Capital Broadcasting News. Authorizes such person to testify and produce documents in such case, except concerning matters determined privileged from disclosure.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Max Barber in "The Christian Broadcasting Network, Inc. v. Carol Ann Kadushin, d/b/a Capital Broadcast News," Civil Action No. 84-1821.
